translation: Selecting a VRM file starts loading and analysis automatically. Adjust the PMX output path if needed, then press Save PMX.
Select the VRM file to convert.
Select a motion (VMD/VPD) file to apply.
Select materials to show or hide.
Specify the PMX output path. A utility-formatted path is auto-generated when VRM is loaded.
Save the already loaded VRM result as PMX.

id: VRMを読み込んでプレビューを表示してください
translation: Load a VRM and display the preview first.

id: VRMファイルを指定してください
PMX出力パスを指定してください
translation: Please specify a PMX output path.

id: VRMデータが見つかりません
